title: How to Unlock Blooper and Hammer Bro. in Mario Party 8

steps.headline: Select the Star Battle Arena in the main menu.
Complete the whole Star Battle.
steps.description: Once you do you will unlock one of either Hammer Bro. or Blooper, the Squid.

steps.headline: Complete Star Battle a second time.
steps.description: Do the star battle again once more. When you get there press continue. Then you will get the character that you did not get last time.

methods.name: Easy characters in Mario Party PC

steps.headline: Get the cost of the tickets by playing mini-games, Party Mode or Star Champ mode.
steps.description: Here are the costs:  Toadette: 250 tickets / Boo: 500 tickets / Blooper: 1200 tickets / Hammer Bro. : 1550 tickets / Koopa: 2100 tickets / Bowser Jr.: 3000 tickets and Red (From Angry Birds) (2014 Limited Edition) ( Jan. 1 to Dec. 31) 5000 tickets.

steps.headline: Complete the Star Champ mode.
steps.description:
Some characters are not shop based, they're unlocked by finishing Star Champ Mode by a different time:
Shy Guy 1 time / Kamek 2 times / DK 3 times / Bowser 5 times / Koopa Kid 7 times and Dry Bones 10 times.

steps.headline: Dry Bones is the only Mario Party 8 character that needs to be unlocked.
steps.description: A hint: Boo, Blooper and Hammer Bro are unlocked in the shop.

text:
Star Battle Arena Select the Star Battle Arena in the main menu.  Pick any character.  Complete the whole Star Battle. Once you do you will unlock one of either Hammer Bro. or Blooper, the Squid. Complete Star Battle a second time. Do the star battle again once more. When you get there press continue. Then you will get the character that you did not get last time. Easy characters in Mario Party PC Get the cost of the tickets by playing mini-games, Party Mode or Star Champ mode. Here are the costs:  Toadette: 250 tickets / Boo: 500 tickets / Blooper: 1200 tickets / Hammer Bro. : 1550 tickets / Koopa: 2100 tickets / Bowser Jr.: 3000 tickets and Red (From Angry Birds) (2014 Limited Edition) ( Jan. 1 to Dec. 31) 5000 tickets. Complete the Star Champ mode. Some characters are not shop based, they're unlocked by finishing Star Champ Mode by a different time:
Shy Guy 1 time / Kamek 2 times / DK 3 times / Bowser 5 times / Koopa Kid 7 times and Dry Bones 10 times. Dry Bones is the only Mario Party 8 character that needs to be unlocked. A hint: Boo, Blooper and Hammer Bro are unlocked in the shop.
